namespace

static java.lang.Object namespace

property

java.lang.Object property
Requires twitter bootstrap for the display to be correct. name: name to show editName: name to edit - default = name label: title type: text, textarea, date, number, radio, checkbox, autocomplete options: map used when type is select, radio or checkbox editable: true|false - default false viewable: true|false - default true optionKey optionValue

sortableColumn

java.lang.Object sortableColumn
Creates a sortable column header that works with the Backbone routing scheme implemented. Creates a TH element that contains a link with the an hash of the property to be sorted.
attr:
property - Name of the property to be sorted
attr:
label - Label for the property. It is passed on to the message source
attr:
defaultOrder - optional parameter, can be: "asc" or "desc"
